Promo: "Get ready to be treated like royalty with Bank of Entitlement-where your every whim is our command!"

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So, let me tell you about the time I single-handedly saved the annual company retreat with my undeniable charm and quick thinking. Picture this: we were all gathered at a luxurious resort, sipping on champagne and enjoying the perfect weather when disaster struck. The catering company messed up the order, and instead of the gourmet meal we were promised, they served us plain old chicken nuggets! Can you believe the audacity?Naturally, chaos ensued as my colleagues started to complain and demand refunds. But not me-I saw this as an opportunity to showcase my unparalleled leadership skills. I marched into the kitchen, demanded to speak to the head chef, and gave him a piece of my mind. I explained to him, in no uncertain terms, that this mishap was simply unacceptable and that he should be grateful for the chance to rectify it under my gracious supervision.With a flick of my perfectly coiffed hair and a flash of my winning smile, I swiftly took control of the situation. I personally designed a new menu on the spot, utilizing my refined palate and impeccable taste to create a culinary masterpiece from the limited ingredients at hand. Within minutes, the chef was following my every instruction, and soon enough, a feast fit for a king was laid out before my colleagues.As I raised my glass in a toast to my own brilliance, I basked in the adulation of my peers, who hailed me as their savior and praised my unparalleled knack for turning a disaster into a triumph. And in that moment, as I reveled in the sweet taste of victory, I knew without a shadow of a doubt that I was, indeed, the epitome of entitlement-and rightfully so.
